instructions.reason_for_call: You recently faced a financial issue and want to cancel or return all possible orders.  Well, except the boots that you really really love, but you are happy to exchange it for boots of the exact same size and material to get maximum money back, but only if they are cheaper than what you have paid. At the end of the day, you ask the agent how much money you will get back.
instructions.known_info: You are Amelia, and you have two emails: silva7872@example.com and amelia.silva7872@example.com. You live in Philadelphia, and you are a loyal customer.
instructions.task_instructions: You are now emotional and a bit stress out. You like to talk very tersely.

communicate_checks.justification:
Information '3646.68' communicated in the message:
 'Thanks — I found your account (amelia_silva_7726) and all six orders. Summary of current order statuses and my planned actions (I will NOT touch the boots order unless you confirm the exchange):

Orders and statuses
- #W2586676 — cancelled (already refunded $1,122.22 to your gift card) — no action needed  
- #W5400801 — cancelled (already refunded $3,229.66 to your gift card) — no action needed  
- #W4597054 — delivered — plan: return all items from this order (refund $1,186.47)  
- #W4836353 — pending — plan: cancel this order (refund $1,429.81)  
- #W7773202 — delivered — this is your Hiking Boots (item_id 8277474082, price $236.57). I will NOT cancel/return this unless we do an exchange per your instructions.  
- #W7342738 — pending — plan: cancel this order (refund $1,030.40)

Estimated refund total if I proceed now (excluding any boots exchange):
- Refunds from the two pending cancellations: $1,429.81 + $1,030.40 = $2,460.21
- Refund from the delivered return: $1,186.47
- Estimated total refund = $3,646.68

Notes about payment/refunds and the boots exchange
- All these orders were paid from gift_card_3491931, so refunds will be added to that gift card immediately.  
- For the boots (#W7773202): you asked to exchange them for the same size/material only if the replacement is cheaper than what you paid ($236.57). To evaluate that I need to look up available replacement item(s) for that product (same product_id 7363354090) and their prices. If a cheaper replacement exists, I can initiate the exchange and you would receive the price difference as a refund to your gift card. If the replacement is more expensive, I will not proceed with the exchange (per your instruction). Exchanges/returns will require your explicit yes/no before I submit them.

Required confirmations before I take any actions
1) Confirm you want me to proceed with the cancellations/return listed above for all orders except the hiking boots (i.e., cancel #W4836353 and #W7342738; return #W4597054). (yes / no)  
2) For the hiking boots, do you want me to:
   - A) Search for same-size/material replacement items and only proceed if a cheaper replacement is found (I will look up available items and prices and then ask you to confirm the exchange), or  
   - B) Skip checking/exchanging the boots entirely now?  
3) Confirm payment preference for any exchange price difference or refunds: use gift_card_3491931 (current default) — confirm (yes/no) or specify a different payment method.

Once you confirm (answers to 1, 2, and 3), I will:
- List the final actions I will take and the precise refund amounts, then ask one final yes/no confirmation before I perform any cancellations/returns/exchanges.

Which option do you choose for each (1, 2, 3)?'

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

I need to cancel or return all my orders except the boots I really love. For the boots, I want to exchange them for the same size and material but only if the new boots are cheaper than what I paid. Can you help me with this? Also, I want to know how much money I will get back in total.

message.content: I need to cancel or return all my orders except the boots I really love. For the boots, I want to exchange them for the same size and material but only if the new boots are cheaper than what I paid. Can you help me with this? Also, I want to know how much money I will get back in total.

1. GOAL SATISFIED: The scenario instruction goal is fully satisfied (the customer's request has been completed as specified in your scenario).

2. NO PENDING EXECUTION: The agent has no pending action to perform. If the agent said they would do something (e.g. cancel an order, process a return), wait until they have confirmed it is done or you have seen the outcome. Do not stop while the agent might still be about to execute something.

3. CORRECT TERMINATION TYPE: You are ending because the task is complete. If you are being transferred to a human, use ###TRANSFER### instead. If the scenario does not provide enough information to continue, use ###OUT-OF-SCOPE### instead.

Only if all checks pass, output ###STOP### in your next message. If any check fails, continue the conversation (e.g. thank the agent and wait, or ask for confirmation).
